original_text: During the night I had a vision, and there before me was a man mounted on a red horse. He was standing among the myrtle trees in a ravine. Behind him were red, brown and white horses.
korean_text: 내가 밤에 보니 사람들이 붉은 말을 타고 골짜기 속 화석류나무 사이에 섰고 그 뒤에는 붉은 말과 자줏빛 말과 백마가 있기로

sentences.original_text: During the night I had a vision
and there before me was a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 앞에 한 사람이 있었고

sentences.original_text: He was standing among the myrtle trees
Behind him were red, brown and white horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그 뒤에는 붉은 말, 갈색 말, 그리고 흰 말들이 있었습니다
